plot: A travel in to a city that hides a paradoxical reality: the contrast of stories and testimonies of everyday life people, who lived and who continue to live the power of the drug trafficking at Medellin.
title: Desde El Otro Lado
plot_es: A travel in to a city that hides a paradoxical reality: the contrast of stories and testimonies of everyday life people, who lived and who continue to live the power of the drug trafficking at Medellin.
plot_en: A travel in to a city that hides a paradoxical reality: the contrast of stories and testimonies of everyday life people, who lived and who continue to live the power of the drug trafficking at Medellin.
